title: What to know about the Pentagon's ultimatum on Anthropic
description: U.S. Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth gave Anthropic an ultimatum: Open its artificial intelligence technology for unrestricted military use by Friday.
content:
NEW YORK — U.S. Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth gave Anthropic an ultimatum this week: Open its artificial intelligence technology for unrestricted military use by Friday, or risk losing its government contract.

title: US military would only use Anthropic's AI technology in legal ways, Pentagon says
description: WASHINGTON — The Pentagon’s top spokesman has reiterated that the military wants to use Anthropic’s artificial intelligence technology in legal ways and will not let the company dictate any limits ahead of a Friday deadline to agree to its demands.
content:
WASHINGTON — The Pentagon’s top spokesman has reiterated that the military wants to use Anthropic’s artificial intelligence technology in legal ways and will not let the company dictate any limits ahead of a Friday deadline to agree to its demands.

title: Artists and writers are often hesitant to disclose they’ve collaborated with AI - and those fears may be justified
description: Generative artificial intelligence has become a routine part of creative work. Novelists are using it to develop plots. Musicians are experimenting with AI-generated sounds. Filmmakers are incorporating it into their editing process. And when the software company Adobe surveyed more than 2,500 creative professionals across four continents in 2024, it…
content:

title: Google unveils Nano Banana 2, a new version of its AI image generator
description: Google has introduced Nano Banana 2, an updated version of its artificial intelligence image generator launched last August that went viral. This new iteration aims to improve speed, instruction...
content: Google has introduced Nano Banana 2, an updated version of its artificial intelligence image generator launched last August that went viral. This new iteration aims to improve speed, instruction understanding and output quality, in a fast-growing AI ... [526 chars]
